function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contamination of burger ingredients during delivery and handling","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases through contaminated food","Mitigation":"Use of proper food handling and packaging techniques to minimize contamination","Technologies":"Packaging materials that are easy to sterilize and wash","People":"Customers, delivery personnel, and restaurant staff","Owner":"Mark and his small team"},{"Description":"Increased reliance on telemedicine without proper training and protocols","Impact":"Risk of inaccurate diagnoses and improper treatment of patients","Mitigation":"Training staff on telemedicine best practices and implementing strict protocols for remote consultations","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms with secure communication and video conferencing features","People":"Healthcare organizations, doctors, and individual patients","Owner":"Owners and partners of the Medical Software Company"},{"Description":"Rapid development of software without thorough testing","Impact":"Risk of technical errors and security vulnerabilities in the software","Mitigation":"Thorough testing of the software, including security testing and user feedback analysis","Technologies":"Software testing tools, security auditing software","People":"Engineers, healthcare organizations, and patients","Owner":"Owners and partners of the Medical Software Company"}]}
